cs213.photoAlbum.model

Class Photo

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.model.Photo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Photo Class. Represents the photo object, stores albums photo is located in, contains time data
    Since:
    01-20-2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tolby Lew
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
